Yes 
There's no 'cancelling' for scholarship. For next year's fee just don't pay the 10k and you're automatically removed from eligibility. The year after that again u choose whether u want to pay the fee or not.

Remember tho, scholarship is only for the first 3 years, in the last year u don't get it.

Short answer - yes

Long answer -
Say you pay 10k for scholarship eligibility 
Then qualify in both sems
U now get 50k back (including both sems) (For CNR)
That's 40k profit

Say u don't qualify for it both sems, but have 7.75+ sgpa
U get 4k as DAC scholarship (including both sems)
That's a 6k loss

Now weigh it out, 6k loss vs 40k profit. You decide.
